data: MASA Li et al. (2024e)
To-tāi-lí kò͘-kè, ū choan-bûn ê hong-hiám kap hôe-pò tāi-lí.
Kin-kù hôe-pò ê chhek-lio̍k to-iūⁿ-sèng ín-tō ki-chè.
Iu-oa̍t ê hong-hiám tiâu-chéng hôe-pò, hâm CSI300, DJIA, S&P500
FreQuant Jeon et al. (2024)
Pín-lu̍t léng-he̍k hun-sek iōng-lâi piān-sek bô͘-sek.
To-lia̍p-tō͘ chu-sán piáu-hiān thàu-kòe DFT.
ARR: 2.1× cheng-chìn, Chhī-tiûⁿ choán-piàn sî ún-tēng-sèng cheng-kiông
EarnMore Zhang et al. (2024d)
Kho-tiau-chéng ê tâu-chu cho͘-ha̍p-tî, iû maskable tokens cho͘-sêng.
Chū-kàm-tok ê masking kap reconstruction.
Lī-sio̍k: +40%, Hong-hiám chúi-pêng chha-put-to
TrendTrader Ding et al. (2024b)
Kè-siàu kap sim-chêng ê to-bô͘-thài iông-ha̍p.
S-khong-sî RL kò͘-kè.
Tī DJIA, SSE-50 téng chí-sò͘, ARR, ASR, MDD piáu-hiān iu-oa̍t
Network-EDM Hui and Wang (2024)
Thàu-kòe bāng-lō͘ lí-lūn lâi kàng-kē ke̍k-toan hong-hiám.
Iōng siōng-tōa to̍k-li̍p chi̍p lâi chò to-iūⁿ-hòa.
Tī CSI 300 chhī-tiûⁿ hā-hêng sî piáu-hiān chhut-sek
Market-Graph Yamagata and Ono (2024)
Kin-kù chhī-tiûⁿ tô͘-hêng ê chū-chi̍p lâi tui-chong chí-sò͘.
Kau-e̍k-liōng hi-sò͘ chèng-chek kap primal-dual splitting.
Tī S&P500 téng ū koh-koân ê Sharpe ratios
LLM-Alpha Kou et al. (2024)
Kin-kù LLM ê alpha factor khai-chhái.
To-tāi-lí hē-thóng, iû tōng-thài koan-tiōng-mn̂g khòng-chè.
Hôe-pò: +53.17% tùi-pí chhī-tiûⁿ -11.73% (Tiong-kok, 2023)
